item.title: Install Squid proxy
item.description: Squid is the most popular Proxy server for Linux systems. The squid proxy server is also useful for the web packet filtering.

s— title: “Create EKS Cluster with eksctl” date: “2022-02-11” thumbnail: “img/eks.png” disable_myintraments: false # Optional, disable Disqus myintraments if true disable_comments: false # Optional, disable Disqus comments if true authorbox: false # Optional, enable authorbox for specific post toc: false # Optional, enable Table of Contents for specific post mathjax: true # Optional, enable MathJax for specific post tags: rss_ignore: true draft: false coffeebox: yes keywords: “devops” “tales” kubernetes deployment CNI CNI Container Network Interface calico AWS EKS VPC CNI eksctl In this pos I will show you how you can install an AWS managed Elastic Kubernetes Service with ekscli.
